OrgName: E. I. DU PONT DE NEMOURS AND COMPANY
activities: E. I. DUPONT DE NEMOURS AND COMPANY (DuPont) receives personal information (PI) relating to current and former employees of its affiliates located in the European Union and European Economic Area to provide Human Resource and Information Technology services and activities.   DuPont receives PI from customers for financial transactions across businesses.  DuPont receives customer PI for sales and marketing purposes for businesses including:  Building Innovations, Titanium Technologies, Performance Polymers, Packaging & Industrial Polymers, and Electronics & Communications.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Current & former employee data for whom DuPont renders HR services. Customer data collected & processed for financial processing of transactions across businesses. Current and prospective customer data collected on- and off-line for select businesses for marketing & sales purposes.
recoursemech:
For HR/Employee Data:  Cooperation with the European Union and Swiss data protection authorities.
For Customer data:  the Alternative Dispute Resolution service selected is JAMS .  http://www.jamsadr.com/
